name: SEDIR KING BREAKFAST (2,4.PERSONS)
description: A mix of cheese and sigara böreği, kuymak, sucuk, potato wedges, fried eggs, ajuka, honey with kaymak, tahini pekmez, apricot , nutella, strawberry, cherry jam, mix fruit, vegetables, labneh, mix olives and unlimited tea

name: SEDİR SERPME BREAKFAST (2 PERSON)
description: Cheese platter, menemen and fried egg, veg potato, cheese roll, nutella tahina, molasses, labneh, 5 type of home made turkish jam, with one turkish tea pot, fresh orange juice

name: SINI BREAKFAST
description: Fried egg, small cheese platter, mix fruit, cucumber,tomato, tahina &moleses and 2 type jams

name: HEALTHY BREAKFAST
description: Avacado toast with poached eggs, zeytin, mixed nuts with honey and creamy peanut butter

name: SINGLE BREAKFAST
description: Fried egg, small cheese platter, mix fruit, cucumber, tomato, 2 type jams and nutella

name: NUTELLA SIMIT
description: Crisp, sesame-crusted Turkish bread rings with nitella

name: FRENCH FRIES
description: Golden, crispy potato sticks of joy
